args.natural_language_statement: Let L : X -> Y be a linear operator between normed vector spaces and suppose L is invertible and L^{-1} is bounded. Show that there exists some δ > 0 such that if ||A - L|| < δ, then A is invertible and ||A^{-1}|| <= ||L^{-1}|| /(1 - ||L^{-1}|| * ||A - L||). (Use the Neumann series.)

-- Translation of the Neumann-series perturbation statement
-- The actual proof is omitted (sorrY)
import Mathlib

noncomputable section

section
variable {𝕜 : Type*} [NormedField 𝕜]
variable {X Y : Type*} [NormedSpace 𝕜 X] [NormedSpace 𝕜 Y]

-- Let L : X →L[𝕜] Y be a bounded linear operator which is invertible with bounded inverse.
-- Then there exists δ > 0 such that if ∥A - L∥ < δ, A is invertible and ∥A⁻¹∥ ≤ ∥L⁻¹∥ / (1 - ∥L⁻¹∥ * ∥A - L∥).
lemma neumann_perturbation_delta
  (L : X →L[𝕜] Y)
  (h_inv : ∃ Linv : Y →L X, Linv.comp L = 1 ∧ L.comp Linv = 1) :
  ∃ δ, 0 < δ ∧ ∀ A : X →L[𝕜] Y, ∥A - L∥ < δ → ∃ Ainv : Y →L X, A.comp Ainv = 1 ∧ Ainv.comp A = 1 ∧
    ∥Ainv∥ ≤ ∥ Classical.choose h_inv ∥ / (1 - ∥ Classical.choose h_inv ∥ * ∥ A - L ∥)
  := by
  -- proof omitted
  sorry

end

noncomputable section

section
variable {𝕜 : Type*} [NormedField 𝕜]
variable {X Y : Type*} [NormedSpace 𝕜 X] [NormedSpace 𝕜 Y]
variable (L : X →L[𝕜] Y)
variable (h_inv : ∃ Linv : Y →L X, Linv.comp L = 1 ∧ L.comp Linv = 1)
lemma neumann_perturbation_delta
  : ∃ δ, 0 < δ ∧ ∀ A : X →L[𝕜] Y, ∥A - L∥ < δ → ∃ Ainv : Y →L X, A.comp Ainv = 1 ∧ Ainv.comp A = 1 ∧
    ∥Ainv∥ ≤ ∥ Classical.choose h_inv ∥ / (1 - ∥ Classical.choose h_inv ∥ * ∥ A - L ∥) :=
by
  sorry
end

args.content:
import Mathlib
open Classical

noncomputable section

section
variable {𝕜 : Type*} [NormedField 𝕜]
variable {X Y : Type*} [NormedSpace 𝕜 X] [NormedSpace 𝕜 Y]

variable (L : X →L[𝕜] Y)
variable (h_inv : ∃ Linv : Y →L X, Linv.comp L = ContinuousLinearMap.id X ∧ L.comp Linv = ContinuousLinearMap.id Y)

lemma neumann_perturbation_delta
  : ∃ δ : ℝ, 0 < δ ∧ ∀ A : X →L[𝕜] Y, ∥A - L∥ < δ → ∃ Ainv : Y →L X, A.comp Ainv = ContinuousLinearMap.id Y ∧ Ainv.comp A = ContinuousLinearMap.id X ∧
    ∥Ainv∥ ≤ ∥ (Classical.choose h_inv) ∥ / (1 - ∥ (Classical.choose h_inv) ∥ * ∥ A - L ∥) :=
by
  -- proof omitted
  sorry

end
